column4: Ugh.. does anyone know where I can find a copy of the GIMPShop .deb file?
Gah, screw it... maybe I should just start learning GIMP.
Six years of experience down the drain... do I really love Linux that much?  Hmm.
Maybe I should setup VMWare.. but is it worth it just for Photoshop?
You know, it's OK, I think I'm just going to dual boot, dude.  Don't go to the trouble.
I found the debian package. Want the link?
After all this hollering and bellyaching, though, I think I may just end up compiling it from source.
Warbo made a good point, which is that GIMPShop is not "part of Ubuntu", which means I really can't expect the repositories to solve my problems for me like usual.
I appreciate your time, though.  Sorry to send you on whatever wild goose chase you just embarked.  :\
actually, it was prominently displayed on the gimpshop front page.
I'm gonna compile from source, too.
